public.guests_view.definition: select "id", "name", "extra", "type", "created_at", "updated_at", "last_authenticated_at", "is_validated", "item_login_schema_id" from "account" where ("account"."type" = 'guest' and "account"."item_login_schema_id" is not null)
public.guests_view.name: guests_view

public.members_view.definition: select "id", "name", "email", "extra", "type", "created_at", "updated_at", "user_agreements_date", "enable_save_actions", "last_authenticated_at", "is_validated" from "account" where ("account"."type" = 'individual' and "account"."email" is not null)
public.members_view.name: members_view
